titleStmt.title: The holy inquisition wherein is represented what is the religion of the Church of Rome, and how they are dealt with that dissent from it.
titleStmt.author: Beaulieu, Luke, 1644 or 5-1723.

notesStmt.note: Written by L. Beaulieu. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in British Library.
